metadata.title: Silanization of primary PDMS replica mold

annotations.note: Silane treatment (silanization) of the PDMSâ€‘based primary replica mold was performed. Details of reagents, conditions, and equipment are not specified in the source.
The silanized primary replica mold was subsequently used to obtain secondary replica molds for PDMS flow layer production. Details of the replication process are not specified.
